ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(Bilateral_Prior_Notification_days__c > Bilateral_referral_days__c, Doc_Prep_prior_Notification_days__c> Doc_Prep_Duration__c, Final_Offer_prior_Notification_days__c> Final_Offers_Duration__c, Unilateral_Prior_Notification_days__c>Unilateral_referral_days__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bilateral, Unilateral, Doc Prep and Final Offers prior notification length must be less than or equal to the corresponding length of that period.
